name: Paddles Of New Generation (Alpha)
description:
P.O.N.G. (i.e. the acronym of "Paddles Of New Generation") is an arcade multiplayer game inspired by a famous 1982 game.

CUSTOMIZE THE GAMEPLAY!

In P.O.N.G. before the match starts, the players decide:

- the type of paddle they want to use 

- the type of ball

- the score that determines the winner

THINGS HAPPEN DURING MATCHES!

A token spawns every so often and can be picked up by players. It will trigger a random event that can be either positive or negative for one or both players. 

THAT'S IT (FOR NOW....)

I had a lot of fun playing this game with my friends, so I hope that it will be the same for you. Let me know in the comment section, I really need your feedback!

Do you want to insult me? Write me at cah.videogames@gmail.com

N.B. P.O.N.G. is the acronym of my game, "Paddles Of New Generation". Every resemblance to any other game's name is purely coincidential.
